ags:resource.dc:title: ORGANIZATION MODEL OF SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH OF STUDENTS

dc:title.dcterms:alternative: ОРГАНИЗАЦИОННАЯ МОДЕЛЬ НАУЧНО-ИССЛЕДОВАТЕЛЬСКОЙ ДЕЯТЕЛЬНОСТИ СТУДЕНТОВ В АГРАРНОМ ВУЗЕ

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In the article are analyzed aspects of organization of scientific research of students of agrarian universities with due regard to their cooperation with professors of an educational establishment. The general algorithm of the activity of students, who is involved in the scientific research, is worded. The series of recommendations are suggested, which provide competent to organize the scientific research of a student-researcher.

ags:citation.ags:citationTitle: Black Sea Scientific Journal of Academic Research
